column4: hey all.....just upgraded to Gutsy.  Looks like I'm having issues with X now.  I can't get anything better than 800x600 resolution.  Any ideas?????
hey all.....just upgraded to Gutsy.  Looks like I'm having issues with X now.  I can't get anything better than 800x600 resolution.  Any ideas?????
does your xorg.conf specify res larger than that?
